head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SUTHERLAND, ROBERT B.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SUTHERLAND, ROBERT B.

block.p: SUTHERLAND--Robert B., 75, of Old Saybrook, CT died January 15th, 2007. Survived by children Claire Sutherland Wade, Beverley M. Sutherland, and Robert B. Sutherland, Jr. and grandchildren Nash and Isabel Sutherland. Services Saturday, 11am-1pm at Swan Funeral Home, 1224 Boston Post Rd., Old Saybrook, CT. In lieu of flowers, donations to Veritas Villa, Inc., Box 610, Kerhonkson, NY 12446.
